alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:22PM EDT until September 07 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Branchdale to Lawn to Jarrettsville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Lebanon, Hershey, Ephrata, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Lititz, Millersville, Willow Street, Mount Joy, Palmyra and New Holland. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 256 to 287. Interstate 78 from mile markers 0 to 7. Interstate 81 from mile markers 79 to 96. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
